metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20063 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
hdf/dataobject.c in libmysofa before 0.8 has an uninitialized use of memory, as demonstrated by mysofa2json.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20063` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 0.9~dfsg0-1
libmysofa0 - 0.9~dfsg0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9~dfsg0-1').
